entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOP @Mike_Pence Yeah right! That's why so many states are suing the White House because they are almost broke because of your horrible response to #COVID19 and your stupid, myopic #republican administration refuses to help them with the trillions of bail out money from middle class tax dollars!
